pullRequest.title: Extracting interface from `ScrollResult` to encapsulate ES-specifics.
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description

Motivation and Context


In order to move all ES-specific implementation details to a separate module, this change is extracting an interface for these from the ScrollResult class.
The ScrollResultIT integration test was moved to the storage module completely, as it currently tests only a detail specific to this implementation (validating that no jest-specific metadata fields are present in the result). If we add further test cases which test cross-implementation functionality, we can introduce an abstract base class.
How Has This Been Tested?



Screenshots (if appropriate):
Types of changes


 Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
 New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
 Refactoring (non-breaking change)
 Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to change)

Checklist:



 My code follows the code style of this project.
 My change requires a change to the documentation.
 I have updated the documentation accordingly.
 I have read the CONTRIBUTING document.
 I have added tests to cover my changes.

nodes.bodyText: Annotations on the same line? Blasphemy!
I know this bug was in here before, but there's a placeholder missing in the format string. I think we should fix that.

commit.message: Trying to remedy the frivolous and profane omission of sacred line breaks.
